job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
We're looking for aspiring and talented developers who want to join our team. We will give you the tools and knowledge to build amazing products and lift your career to new heights.
If you think about coding as craftsmanship, have an academic or similar background in software engineering, and want to learn how to build incredible software in record speeds, you've come to the right place.
Requirements
2-4 years working as a developer
BSc Computer Science, Mathematics, or any related degree/relevant experience
All around player, fast, self-learning individual
Experience working in a Linux environment
Passion for code craftsmanship
Smart, problem solver
Loves getting shit done!
Experience developing customer facing/web/app products a plus
Experience in server side Javascript, Python or Ruby a plus
